content.text:
# List of United States electronic warfare aircraft

.]]
This list covers both currently and formerly operated electromagnetic warfare aircraft (typically airborne early warning and control aircraft) used by the United States.
As such there will be overlaps with United States command and control aircraft and United States airborne early warning aircraft.

!Grumman EA-6A "Electric Intruder"
|Electronic warfare (EW)/Electronic countermeasures (ECW)
|Grumman
|Converted Grumman A-6 Intruder designed for the United States Marine Corps, designed to provide a new ECM platform to replace the EF-10B Skyknights and AD Skyraiders; it served with the USMC during the Vietnam War in 1966. The last EA-6A had been retired by 1993. Later upgraded into the Grumman EA-6B Prowler.
